timeline.description: Born on 3rd May in Navi Mumbai
Completed 10th grade from DAV Public School, Nerul
Completed 12th grade from Harmony Public School, Nerul
Enrolled at MIT ADT University, Pune for a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology
Began internship as a Data Engineer Intern at Collabera Inc.
Joined Collabera Digital as an Associate Data Engineer
Promoted to Data Engineer at Collabera Digital
Advanced to Senior Generative AI Developer, specializing in AI-driven solutions
